Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface FlipFitCenterSlotDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitCenterSlotDAOImpl
public interface FlipFitCenterSlotDAOInterface
Interface for FlipFit Center Slot Data Access Object (DAO) operations. Provides methods to handle slot-related functionalities for gym centres.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • findSlotBySlotId

      FlipFitCenterSlot findSlotBySlotId(String slotId)
      Finds a slot by its unique slot ID.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The unique ID of the slot to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The FlipFitCenterSlot object if found, otherwise null.

    • findSlotByCentreAndStartTime

      FlipFitCenterSlot findSlotByCentreAndStartTime(String centreId, LocalTime startTime)
      Finds a slot by gym centre ID and its start time.
      Parameters:
      centreId - The ID of the gym centre where the slot exists.
      startTime - The start time of the slot to be found.
      Returns:
      The FlipFitCenterSlot object if found, otherwise null.

    • addSlot

      void addSlot(FlipFitCenterSlot slot) throws GymSlotAlreadyExistsException
      Adds a new slot to the system.
      Parameters:
      slot - The FlipFitCenterSlot object representing the slot to be added.
      Throws:
      GymSlotAlreadyExistsException - If a slot with the same details already exists.

    • updateSlot

      void updateSlot(String slotId, LocalTime startTime, Integer noOfSeats) throws InvalidSlotException
      Updates an existing slot in the system.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The unique ID of the slot to be updated.
      startTime - The new start time for the slot.
      noOfSeats - The new number of seats available for the slot.
      Throws:
      InvalidSlotException - If the slot ID is invalid or not found.

    • getSlotsByGymId

      List<FlipFitCenterSlot> getSlotsByGymId(String gymId)
      Retrieves all slots for a specific gym based on the gym ID.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique ID of the gym to retrieve slots for.
      Returns:
      A List of FlipFitCenterSlot objects representing the slots available for the gym.

    • getSlotById

      FlipFitCenterSlot getSlotById(String slotId)
      Retrieves a specific slot by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The unique ID of the slot to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The FlipFitCenterSlot object if found, otherwise null.

    • deleteSlot

      void deleteSlot(String slotId) throws InvalidSlotException
      Deletes a slot from the system.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The unique ID of the slot to be deleted.
      Throws:
      InvalidSlotException - If the slot ID is invalid or not found.

    • getAvailableSlots

      List<FlipFitCenterSlot> getAvailableSlots(String gymId, LocalDate date)
      Retrieves all available slots for a specific gym on a particular date.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The unique ID of the gym to retrieve available slots for.
      date - The date on which to retrieve available slots.
      Returns:
      A List of FlipFitCenterSlot objects representing available slots for the gym on the specified date.
